entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
